originalText:
::Biocorp Undernavy DED Ceto

Access terminal: Bridge.::

::Deck Log: 001259      Record of all events of the day

1139: Undernavy Admiral Jeff Horten has the deck. I hereby announce that the admiral himself - that is me; Fleet Colonel Smith - that is Sucker; Commodore Hoover - that is Johnnie Boy; and even Seaman Last Class Uri - that ration-stealing son of a beast; have all been relieved from their duty in the Mavros region and will be soon picked up and returned home to Dis! Rejoice, seamen!
1231: Fleet Colonel *TED* Smith has the deck. Yeah right, your Admiral Assery! Commodore Hoover and I have invented a new game - Deck Log Underships. The rules are the same as in regular underships, it's just that we will be using Ceto's deck log to post shots. Daily. Hopefully this will give us some incentive to write something useful in the deck log.
1232: F6.
1617: Commodore Hoover just coming over to see... aaaand miss! J10.
2304: You missed his boat. I miss women.
2348: Shut up, ration thief. We all do.
2359: Miss. A2.
0340: I wish Drogo was still around. He had a lot of imagination.
0704: Wrong day, moron! You're supposed to move the timestamp to the next day.
0908: Who gives a crap? Miss. I9.::

::Deck Log: 001391      Record of all events of the day

9999: Supreme Emperor of Biocorp Francis Uri has the deck. His Royal Majesty of Everything Ted Smith died today of a heart attack, making me the only surviving crew member of BCUN Ceto. He has been under a lot of stress lately. He already kind of lost it when he blew Horten's brains out. He really lost it when Hoover decided to walk home two weeks ago. Can't blame him. The last leave we got was when Drogo left, the lucky bastard. Then they forgot about us. 

Well, off I go to piss on Horten's grave and shoot a horned beast for me and Anna.::

::1239: Complete vessel inspection completed. Full technical details logged by Chief Engineer Eric Sowel. No major issues detected.  Maintenance crew departs vessel.
1300: White watch stands down. Blue watch takes the deck.
1301: Junior Lieutenant Peter Supovitz has the deck. W/NC. A/NC.
1339: Commodore boards vessel.
1532: BCN3 news crew boards ship and interviews personnel.
1632: News crew departs vessel.
1635: Commodore departs vessel.
1900: Senior Staff Ensign Donald Oberman has the deck. Light swell, S. Warm breeze from SE. Blue watch stands down. Red watch takes the deck.
2300: Red watch stands down. All night in.::

::1409: A large civilian crowd gathers at the pier, taking pictures, talking to the crew, giving them gifts. Several seamen have had colored handkerchiefs tied to their wrists by women. Some were even given flowers. Lots of colors on the deck, mostly from thrown holo-orbs.
1422: Commodore departs vessel.
1759: The crowd disperses.
1830: Conducted inspection of all gifted items brought onto the vessel - all clear.
1900: Senior Staff Ensign Donald Oberman has the deck. W/NC. Warm breeze from SE. Blue watch stands down. Red watch takes the deck.
2217: Two of the crew members got into a brawl with four patrons of Guts of Super Steel bar, inflicting light injuries to three of them while breaking the fourth one's nose. Witness testimonies do not agree on who started the fight. The seamen were assigned to extra duties for three days, or less in case of a premature start of Operation Charybdis, and have had their shore leave time restricted.
2300: Red watch stands down. All night in.::

::1322: Captain Hydrick and Captain Jacobs depart.
1330: Commodore issues an official announcement to the crew regarding the merging of strike groups Ceto and Phorcys into the Mavros Flotilla under his own command. The commodore also announces tomorrow's tactical drill.
1428: Commodore departs vessel.
1517: Supplies from Strike Group Phorcys brought onto vessel.
1841: Commodore boards vessel.
1900: Senior Staff Ensign Donald Oberman has the deck. Blue watch stands down. Red watch takes the deck.
2249: A giant rat has been spotted swimming near the vessel. Threat level minimal. No action necessary.
2300: Red watch stands down. All night in.::

::1241: Mavros Flotilla arrives to Core port. Vessel moors starboard side to pier 3 with standard mooring lines doubled.
1300: Junior Lieutenant Peter Supovitz has the deck. White watch stands down. Blue watch takes the deck.
1515: Commodore departs vessel.
1600: Phorcys leaves Core and heads for the Black Sea Strait, from where it will release recon mini subs to perform reconnaissance deeper into the NFT territory.
1748: Commodore boards vessel.
1900: Senior Staff Ensign Donald Oberman has the deck. Blue watch stands down. Red watch takes the deck.
2300: Red watch stands down. All night in.::

::1335: Chief Engineer Eric Sowel issued his final report regarding Ceto's status. After more than a week of virtually ceaseless repairs he and his engineers have been conducting, today he came to the bridge and informed me that without a completely new propulsion engine, Ceto will never be able to sail again. It appears that the spare materials and components we have been supplied with have proven insufficient and that the damage was simply too great. I have granted the chief engineer and his team some much needed rest, as Ceto is now nothing more than a static artillery position.
1500: Blue watch stands down. Red watch takes the deck.
1630: Senior Lieutenant Josh S. Carter has the deck. Water calm, wave length average. Warm breeze. No new reports of enemy activity.
1826: Chemical Assault Team 1 reported that they have successfully deployed dispersion bots into the ventilation system of what we presume is NFT's military HQ and exfiltrated the area safely.
1900: Red watch stands down. White watch takes the deck.
2217: Senior Staff Ensign Donald Oberman has the deck. Water calm, wave length average. Warm breeze. No new reports of enemy activity.
2301: White watch stands down. Blue watch takes the deck.::

::1309: Hoover shot a horned beast from the deck from around 300 meters away with a .339. Guess we're going to have a feast tonight.
1844: Dropped a piece of meat on my pants. Had just washed them.
1935: Water is still calm and no dead NFT soldiers have risen from the sea.
2127: A fight broke out moments ago between Horten and Smith. Smith slammed Horten in the gut before throwing a left hook and sending the poor guy to sleep. I won the bet.
2319: Seaman Jeff Horten signs in. Ted Smith can suck it.::

::E5.
Miss. F8.
Miss. E5.
Miss. You just tried that. C9.
I didn't write that. It's that piece of crap Horten messing with the game again.
When's the next leave? How long has it been? Three months? Four? Longer?
YOU MESS WTH THE GAM ONE MORE TIME HORTEN AND ILL PUTT ONE TROUGH YOUR SKULL! I SWEAR!
Miss. E5.::

::1612: Captain Jacobs departs vessel.
1630: Commodore addresses the crew. The combat phase of Operation Charybdis has officially begun. The Mavros Flotilla will enter NFT territory and engage the enemy forces as soon as the strait has been cleared. Watch schedule has been reverted to four-hour rotations and combat readiness to be maintained at all times.
1700: Junior Lieutenant Peter Supovitz has the deck. Red watch stands down. White watch takes the deck.
2100: Senior Staff Ensign Donald Oberman has the deck. White watch stands down. Blue watch takes the deck.::
